divs: Sighting Detailsmyself and 6 friends where walking in the old town area of arvada Colorado at around 5:30 in the evening.one of the girls pointed to the south and ask me what kind of aircraft those are,as my career is aviation.The three yellow orange lights on the horizon where in a staggered left and down formation and where stationary.the bottom object then turned towards the west and appeared to have a sparkling tail on it.the middile object disappeared and reapered then all three moved in various directions and would disappear and reappear for a few more minutes until all three disappeared for good.anouther passerby said he had seen the same objects at various locations over the Denver metro skyline for a few weeks
Summary: three orange yellow lights with sparking tails over denver metro area
